ComicInfo.Summary: Our heroes battle bloodstains in "Slice of Life" while a new kind of monster slayer stalks the backroads of America in "Highwayman to Heaven"and Cassie meets up with the baddest bad girl in the multiverse in "I Will Destroy You All."
